Comments.Message:
This is tracked by https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/2984

Can you give this file a try and see if you are still running into issues: https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/blob/892bc6d7cb9db654395cf3489b9b61aa099fb433/bin/lib.d.ts


Also please note that TypeScript has moved to [github](can you give this file a try and see if you are still running into issues: https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript). please use the [github issue tracker](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues) to file new issues.
